name: tulip-compliance-test
description: Tulip Compliance Testing Platform - Production Grade Setup

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.quality:fix: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.prepare: command -v pre-commit >/dev/null 2>&1 && pre-commit install || echo 'pre-commit not installed, skipping hook setup'
